recipes.label: Buy An Instrument?
recipes.startdescription: "My apologies... But if you do not have a space set up for this practice, I cannot sell you our wares. Attuned Instruments require special practice, and we take to much pride to let our work be sullied." [Keep dedicated space in the hold of your ship empty to buy another Instrument.] "

recipes.label: Buy an Attuned Instrument from Baruch ibn Yahya
recipes.startdescription: "Let me know what holds your interest, and I shall do my best to supply." [Indicate which Aspect you would like to buy an Instrument for with that Song.]

recipes.label: Buy a Lantern Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"I used to have said no, but recently, our technology has advanced. Let me show you."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Voice was the preferred method for Lantern performances for centuries. But now we can sing without using throat or touch."@

recipes.label: Buy a Forge Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Ah... I will call the boys... You'll see why."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"My sons will come and help you assemble. The alloys are intricate, and some connections must be made with the right application of heat."@

recipes.label: Buy a Edge Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Ah yes... The instruments have changed over the years, but the method of preparation has not. Wait one moment."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Not easy to acquire these. To be properly Attuned, they must have seen 66 battles at least."@

recipes.label: Buy a Winter Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"The eternal conundrum... Which instrument can be used to enhance the principle of Silence."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"We must smelt these ourselfs. Coffin nails and sanctified silver, among other things."@

recipes.label: Buy a Heart Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Unsurprisingly, our most requisted item. For a London client alone, we have sold a companies worth. "@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Boar skin, of course. Pine wood is traditional, but we have replaced the frame with something more durable. "@

recipes.label: Buy a Grail Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Like with my children, I probably should not have favorites among the instruments. But on these alone our craftmanship is truely appreciated."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"We once displayed these in our windows, but it ran the risk of our crowding our store. Now we put them up for auction at select auction houses... We always venture to buy them back."@

recipes.label: Buy a Moth Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Ah... yes, This will interest you, I am sure. In a way, you are our collaborator here."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"The strings have been treated with the Spiteful Resin. Be careful with it, it aches to change. But that tension is what colors the sounds most extraordinarily."@

recipes.label: Buy a Knock Instrument
recipes.startdescription: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Certainly. The method is imported, but the instrument will come from our very own shop."@
recipes.description: @#mariner.locations.northsea.copenhagen.instrumentshop|"Hawthorn wood, sanded with snake scales. The strings are spun from feathers, But do not ask me the method, it is quite well protected.@
